text: When making important life decisions, what matters most to you?
options: Helping others and making a difference

text: How important is work-life balance to you?
Rank these values in order of importance to you:
In your ideal career, which of these would you prioritize? (Select all that apply)
options: Meaningful work that aligns with my values
Flexible schedule and remote work options
Recognition and appreciation for my contributions

text: How much do you value tradition and established ways of doing things?
When facing a moral dilemma, what guides your decision-making?
options: What will cause the least harm to others
What is right according to my principles
What will lead to the best outcome for everyone
What feels right in my heart
What respected authorities or traditions say

text: Rate how important these aspects of life are to you:
What motivates you most in your daily life?
options: Connecting with people I care about

text: How do you prefer to spend your free time?
options: Spending quality time with family and friends
Volunteering or helping in my community

text: When you look back on your life, what do you hope to be remembered for?
options: The positive impact I had on others
The love and relationships I built
